sourceMeaningMnemonic: An <radical>axe</radical> is stuck into the <radical>ground</radical> on a <kanji>hill</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Imagine climbing up the hill. The sun is coming up behind the axe,  silhouetting the whole thing very nicely.
readingMnemonic: You reach the top of the <kanji>hill</kanji> and realize the entire hill is covered in <reading>cu</reading>cumbers (<ja>きゅう</ja>). The axe has a little note on it that says "Cucumber Hill Axe - Please Use."
readingInfo: You take the axe out of the hill and cut off some cucumber to eat. Mm mm!
